roleset.name: give a name, assign a designation to

example.name: passive
example.text: Because the funds ' investments are denominated [*]in foreign currencies , their value expressed [*] in dollars goes up when those currencies rise against the dollar [*T*-2] .

example.name: Red Pants. Did I mention I love ULA corpus?
example.text: From a lifetime of undisciplined reading with innocent pencil in hand and malice prepense in mind , I have gleaned a harvest of what I am pleased to denominate Red Pants items , a sampling of which follows .
example.arg: Pants items , a sampling of which follows

example.name: denomination-n
example.text: Machu Picchu: Worth its denomination as marvel of the world

roleset.note: DENOMINATION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia for unification. (from denomination.01-n)
